answers.author: Frank Thomas
answers.text:
Tracy: The City of Fort Lauderdale outsourced its vehicle maintenance years ago and at one time was considerde to be very innovative in that area. Their contract provided downtime deadlines for all vehicles especiallly emergency vehicles. There were penalties for exceeding the downtime deadlines and bonuses for work that was considerably less that the expected downtime. I've been away from Lauderdale for quite a number of years but you may wish to check them out.

author: Tracy Miller
text:
A Florida city would like to obtain copies of RFP's for fleet maintenance services from cities who have outsourced their fleet maintenance functions. The RFP would need to cover all preventative maintenance and repair services and require that the successful bidder have a certified Emergency Vehicle Technician on staff.  
Reply here or directly to Tracy Miller 
Thank you.
title: Fleet Maintenance RFP's
